title: Illuminate
description: Even the bad boys need saving sometimes...Hot-headed Luminary, Merrin is an outcast Tracker guarding one of the borders closest to Tartarean's stronghold. Tarquin is a Hunter who survives with no memory of who he was before Lucius Tartarean coerced him into service. Forced to kill on demand and to use his manipulation skills on weaker Luminaries, he's nothing more than a slave to the dark that controls his every move. When Merrin is called to Track a fallen Luminary, she isn't prepared for her attraction to a tempting half-light who shouldn't exist.For fans of paranormal romance who love smouldering anti-heroes and misfit heroines.
author: Sarah Addison-Fox
